uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.managers
Class CollectionManager<Id,Man extends IManager>

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.managers.CollectionManager<Id,Man>
Type Parameters:
Id - The type defining the Id of each item (key type)
Man - The type of manager for each of the items.
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeletableCollectionManager
public class CollectionManager<Id,Man extends IManager>
extends java.lang.Object

Manages a collection of server side objects referenced by an id.

Method Detail

addManager

public boolean addManager(Id id,
                          Man man)
Try to add a new manager.

Parameters:
id - The id associated with this manager - don't pass null
man - The actual manager - don't pass null
Returns:
true if the manager was added. Or false if the id was already in use.

forgetManager

public boolean forgetManager(Id id)
Forget the manager is here, but don't delete it.

Parameters:
id - The id of the manager to remove.
Returns:
true if the manager existed and was removed.
See Also:
DeletableCollectionManager.deleteManager(Object)

public java.util.Set<Id> getManagers()
Get a set of Ids for all managers.

Returns:
Set of managers.

getManager

public Man getManager(Id id)
Grabs a manager if one exists for this id.

Parameters:
id - Id for this manager.
Returns:
A manager or null if none exists for the given id.
